commentMessage: I agree with the core of this post: to create a repository for storing queries. It has happened -too many times- that the same task is done again in a different project, wasted time to fix or create something that has been done before. That's why I'm saving useful code and queries using Slack. I have a channel for major topics. We all can go there to search for answers or history.
It is quite a general problem in the personal digital sphere: where is the file I need now, where is the message I need to refer to now? and so on.
